content.description: Which of the following functions are continuous on the interval <math alttext="0 is less than x, is less than 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?
content.question: <math alttext="f of x, equals, the fraction with numerator x minus 3, and denominator x squared, minus 9, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="g of x, equals, the fraction with numerator x minus 3, and denominator x squared, plus 9, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="h of x, equals, the natural log of, open parenthesis, x minus 3, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
